backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high-level product features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH brand colors, CSS variables, and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout assembling the header, all content sections, and footer into a single-page site.
frontend/src/components/sections/Faculty: Faculty grid section displaying six detailed tutor profiles with bios, roles, and subjects.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section featuring headline, CTAs, stats, and a large illustration with themed visuals.
frontend/src/components/sections/LiveSes: Renders a section showcasing types of live learning sessions and their benefits using cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/NotesSe: Displays study notes, mark schemes, and downloadable resources in a grid of cards with feature lists.
frontend/src/components/sections/Tutorin: Presents features of 1:1 tutoring sessions with icon cards and a call-to-action button.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, contact info, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky responsive header with logo, smooth-scroll navigation, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Project state describing a marketing website build for Discademia, listing required sections, features, and image assets. Contains versioning, feature definitions, and overall project description.
